name: The Horror of The Vigil
description:
A cult appeared in a commune called Curalaba in the Chiloé providence in Chile, 1994. Some months later, Curalaba was reporting several cases of missing girls...

You're being paid to do Vigils in order to protect the girls from being kidnapped.

Made for the MrKravin Jam: https://itch.io/jam/mrkravin-gj-2021-spring

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • X to use your flashlight
  • Enter/Esc to Pause the game
  • Z to confirm
  • F4 to Fullscreen

Duration: 15 minutes more or less.
